tagline: Learn Indian Sign Language (ISL) and bridge communication gaps through translation tools and a gamified web experience.
purpose: Built to help bridge communication gaps for the Deaf/Hard-of-Hearing community in India, providing ISL learning and bidirectional translation utilities.

apps.name: Signify Web Game (PWA)
apps.whatItIs: A static frontend + Flask backend web app (PWA) for learning ISL using interactive learning, quizzes, and play modes.
notes: Leaderboards are stored in the user's browser (local storage).
The app can be installed as a PWA in supported browsers.

pages.title: Home
pages.description: Entry point with navigation to Learn, Quiz, and Play, plus leaderboards.

pages.title: Learn
pages.description: Learning section that shows signs for letters/words (practice-focused).

pages.title: Quiz (Menu)
pages.description: Quiz entry/selection page that leads into quiz experience.

pages.title: Quiz
pages.description: Interactive quiz to test recognition of ISL letters/numbers.

pages.title: Play (Mode Selection)
pages.description: Play area entry where the user selects a game mode/category.

pages.title: Play (Single / Game Screen)
pages.description: Core play screen used for interactive practice/game flows.

pages.title: Developer Examples
pages.description: Shows example requests and explains backend prediction API usage at a high level.

pages.title: FAQs
pages.description: Frequently asked questions about Signify and how the web game works.

pages.title: About
pages.description: About the project, purpose, and the team/event context.

pages.title: Contact
pages.description: Contact/credits page listing the team members and mentor.

pages.title: Offline
pages.description: Fallback page shown when offline (PWA support).

apiEndpoints.description: Takes a base64 image and returns predicted sign (letter/number) with confidence.
Optional AI helper for short hints/facts (requires PERPLEXITY_API_KEY).
Health check endpoint used by hosting platforms.

backend.privacyNote: The web game captures camera input in the browser and sends frames to /predict for recognition (no server-side camera access required).

apps.name: Streamlit Translator App
apps.whatItIs: A Streamlit app providing translation utilities (speech-to-sign, text-to-sign) and real-time recognition workflows.
notableFeatures: Speech-to-sign and text-to-sign flows for basic letters/digits.
Supports gTTS for audio output and can be extended for Indian languages.
